description: Brise, with mother-of-pearl sticks carved with floral diaper and pierced in a design of bird and floral medallions encrusted with gold.  The center is carved with a design of four women in classical gowns playing musical instruments.  This decoration is set on a ground pierced to represent net.  Silver rivet inlaid with a rhinestone.  There is a small break in the net field of the sticks.
title: Fan
